text: "What Makes a Man" is a 2000 song by Irish group Westlife. It is the third single from their second studio album Coast to Coast. It went to number 2 in the United Kingdom, Ireland and Scotland and missed out topping the single charts in the United Kingdom, Ireland and Scotland. ==Track listings== UK CD1 and cassette single # "What Makes a Man" (single remix) # "I'll Be There" # "My Girl" UK CD2 # "What Makes a Man" (single remix) # "I'll Be There" # "What Becomes of the Brokenhearted" ==References== Category:2000 songs Category:Westlife songs
title: What Makes a Man
